metadata.title: BDF 4CD Decorative Window Film Curtain Dot (24in X 7ft)
features: [TRENDY AND ARTISTIC WINDOW] Vertical rows of white dots create curtain like lines that give stylish form on a plain window.
[SHATTERPROOF] Works like a barrier to shatter glass with its shatterproof protection.
[EXCELLENT SEMI- PRIVACY AND UV BLOCKING.] Allows natural sunlight while having privacy due to transparency and offers UV blocking to reduce fading on furnishings cause by the sun.

[POLYESTER WITH STRONG ADHESIVES.] Polyester films are more transparent, unblurred, smooth and thin than PVC. Lasts many years, for easier installation, remember to use A LOT of soap/water mixture to soak both the adhesive side and window.
[FREE TOOLS AND EASY INSTALLATION GUIDE] Makes installation DIY-friendly. Make sure window surface is completely clean and free of any blemishes
description: One of the bare necessities of glass and windows in an office or a home environment is adequate protection of the interior by a window film that ensures privacy while expressing personality. Our BDF decorative films will add privacy and style at a fraction of the cost of laminated panels, patterned, or frosted glass. Apply to any flat glass, our pressure-sensitive adhesive will make application process easy and simple. The White Curtain Dot Decorative Window Film series exhibits an innovative design print that is both controlled in order and avant-garde in artistic taste. Transform your environment into one of elegance and luxury by providing your windows with an abstract look that seems to embody that of contemporary art. The Curtain Dot Decorative Window Film has tiny dots in a formation of a line making it look like a piece of curtain. The pattern repeats across the entire roll of film.
